title: Egypt
summary: With a continuous presence in Egypt since 1975, Citi has been actively involved in major local financings and has facilitated key capital market transactions on behalf of the institutional clients. Citi serves multinationals and global investor clients active in the Egyptian market, and fully supports their banking, investments  and credit requirements as applicable. . This comes in addition to Citi’s community service contributions.  Citi has been an active player in the local Egyptian community , through engaging with reputable NGOs operating in the country and providing financial contributions as well to suppor financial literacy, education, microfinance and community development.
tag-2: Supporting multinationals wanting to invest in Egypt, and Egyptian companies looking to expand globally.
